titleStmt.title: A discourse of sea-ports principally the port and haven of Dover / written by Sir Walter Rawleigh and address'd to Queen Elizabeth ; with useful remarks &c, on that subject by command of His late Majesty K. Charles the second.
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
Digges, Dudley, Sir, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for and sold by John Nutt,

notesStmt.note: Also attributed to Sir Dudley Digges--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Goldsmiths Library, University of London.
